name: Go4hosting
tag_list: web-hosting-india, dedicated-server-india, vps-server-india, data-center-india, colocation-india, server-hosting-india, web-server-hosting-services
description: Data center Services provider in India
overview: Go4hosting is a flagship company of IT and ITES services major, Cyber Futuristics India Private Limited offering a wide array of hosting solutions. Top notch hosting services has always been the beacon light of our company. Customers from individual users to small, medium and big businesses and webmasters have found our pricing, performance and support as most cost-effective. The parent company of Go4hosting (Cyber Futuristics India Private Limited) has been involved in providing quality Application Development , Remote Infrastructure Management and BPO Services for last 10 Years. Cyber Futuristic stakeholders include Venture Capital Fund owned by Rajasthan State Government Fund and SIDBI. Go4hosting was created in 2000 as a result of the new demand for faster & more reliable everything.
